curam.util.workflow.supervisor.impl
Class BusinessObjectAssociationWorkspace

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.workflow.supervisor.impl.BusinessObjectAssociationWorkspace

public final class BusinessObjectAssociationWorkspace
extends java.lang.Object

The BusinessObjectAssociationWorkspace class provides the API methods to allow supervisors to search for tasks that are associated with a specified business object.

Method Summary

Method Detail

countBusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueInTheNextWeek

public static BusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueInTheNextTimePeriodDetailsList countBusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueInTheNextWeek(BusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueInTheNextWeekKey key)
                                                                                                                           throws AppException,
                                                                                                                                  InformationalException
Returns a list of counts for reserved and unreserved tasks for a specified business object association grouped by the date that these tasks are due on. This method will be called to return data for a specified number of days of a week. Tasks with a status of CLOSED will not be included in the results.

Parameters:
key - The key required to identify the reserved and unreserved tasks for a specified business object association. The key also includes a task deadline date to search on and also the number of days that results are required for.
Returns:
A list of counts for reserved and unreserved tasks for a specified business object association grouped by the date that these tasks are due on. A record is also returned even if there are no tasks reserved or unreserved for that specified data. In this scenario, both the reserved and unreserved counts will be zero.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may be thrown when searching for a list of reserved and unreserved tasks for a specified business object association.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

countBusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueInTheNextMonth

public static BusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueInTheNextTimePeriodDetailsList countBusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueInTheNextMonth(BusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueInTheNextMonthKey key)
                                                                                                                            throws AppException,
                                                                                                                                   InformationalException
Returns a list of counts for reserved and unreserved tasks for a specified business object association grouped by the date that these tasks are due on. This method will be called to return data for a specified number of weeks in a month. Tasks with a status of CLOSED will not be included in the results.

Parameters:
key - The key required to identify the reserved and unreserved tasks for a specified business object association. The key also includes a task deadline date to search on and also the number of weeks that results are required for.
Returns:
A list of counts for reserved and unreserved tasks for a specified business object association grouped by the date that these tasks are due on. A record is also returned even if there are no tasks reserved or unreserved for that specified data. In this scenario, both the reserved and unreserved counts will be zero.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may be thrown when searching for a list of reserved and unreserved tasks for a specified business object association.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getBusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueOnDate

public static BusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueOnDateDetailsList getBusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueOnDate(BusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueOnDateKey key)
                                                                                                     throws AppException,
                                                                                                            InformationalException
Returns a list of the task details that are associated with a specified business object association that are due on a specific date. This function may be used to search for all tasks due on the specific date, the reserved tasks for a business object association due on that specific date or the unreserved tasks for a business object association due on that specific date. Tasks with a status of CLOSED will not be included in the results.

Parameters:
key - The details required to uniquely identify the business object association whose task details will be returned. The reservation status of the tasks required may also be specified in the search criteria.
Returns:
A list of the task details that are associated with a specified business object association that are due on a specific date based on the reservation status of those tasks.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may be thrown when searching for the task details that are associated with a specified business object association and are due on a specific date.
InformationalException - Generic Information Exception.

getBusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueByWeek

public static BusinessObjectAssociationTasksDetailsList getBusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueByWeek(BusinessObjectAssociationTasksDueOnDateKey key)
                                                                                            throws AppException,
                                                                                                   InformationalException
Returns a list of the task details that are associated with a specified business object association that are due within the next week. This function may be used to search for all tasks due within that week, the reserved tasks for a business object association due within that week or the unreserved tasks for a business object association due within the specified week. Tasks with a status of CLOSED will not be included in the results.

Parameters:
key - The details required to uniquely identify the business object association whose task details will be returned. The reservation status of the tasks required may also be specified in the search criteria.
Returns:
A list of the task details that are associated with a specified business object association that are due within the next week based on the reservation status of those tasks.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may be thrown when searching for the task details that are associated with a specified business object association and are due within the next week.
InformationalException - Generic Information Exception.

getBusinessObjectAssociationTasks

public static BusinessObjectAssociationTasksDetailsList getBusinessObjectAssociationTasks(BusinessObjectAssociationTasksKey key)
                                                                                   throws AppException,
                                                                                          InformationalException
Returns a list of the task details for a specified business object association. Depending on the input parameter data, the function may return all of the tasks associated with a specified business object association, all of the reserved tasks associated with a specified business object association or all the tasks that have not yet been reserved for a specified business object association. Tasks with a status of CLOSED will not be included in the results.

Parameters:
key - The input parameter data required to uniquely identify the business object association whose list of tasks details will be returned.
Returns:
A list of the task details for a specified business object association.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may be thrown when searching for the tasks associated with a specified business object association.
InformationalException - Generic Information Signature.

countBusinessObjectAssociationReservedTasksByUser

public static BusinessObjectAssociationReservedTasksByUserDetailsList countBusinessObjectAssociationReservedTasksByUser(BusinessObjectAssociationReservedTasksByUserKey key)
                                                                                                                 throws AppException,
                                                                                                                        InformationalException
Returns a count of both the open and deferred tasks for each user that has tasks reserved for a specified business object association. As tasks that have a status of CLOSED do not have the reservedBy field populated, they will not be included in the results of this search.

Parameters:
key - The data required to identify the business object association whose count of open and deferred tasks for each user that has tasks reserved for that business object association will be returned.
Returns:
A count of both the open and deferred tasks for each user that has tasks reserved for a specified business object association.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may be thrown when searching for the tasks for a user associated with a specified business object association.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getBusinessObjectAssociationTasksByUser

public static BusinessObjectAssociationTasksByUserDetailsList getBusinessObjectAssociationTasksByUser(BusinessObjectAssociationTasksByUserKey key)
                                                                                               throws AppException,
                                                                                                      InformationalException
Returns a list of the task details for a specified business object association based on the user that has reserved the task and the status of the task. Tasks with a status of CLOSED will not be included in the results.

Parameters:
key - The fields required to search for all of the tasks associated with a specified business object association based on whether the task is reserved or not and the status of the tasks.
Returns:
A list of the task details for a specified business object association based on user that has reserved the task and the status of the task.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may be thrown when searching for the list of tasks associated with a business object association based on the user that has reserved the task and the status of the task.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
